title: Uzbekistan greenlights stablecoins for payments under new sandbox regime
description:
Uzbekistan is moving to bring stablecoins into its formal payment system, starting with a tightly controlled developmental sandbox, according to local media.

According to a Friday report by local news outlet Kun, Uzbekistan’s new stablecoin regulatory framework will come into force on Jan. 1, 2026....

title: Uzbekistan Legalizes Stablecoins for Payments and Tokenized Stocks in Massive 2026 Overhaul
description:
Uzbekistan is preparing to integrate stablecoins into its formal payment system and allow the issuance of tokenized stocks and bonds under a tightly regulated framework starting in 2026, according to local media reports.

The plan positions the country to become one of Central Asia’s most structured...

title: Uzbekistan Reveals New External Borrowing Strategy In 2026
description:
MENAFN - Trend News Agency). Uzbekistan expects to attract $5 billion in external borrowing next year, Trend reports via the Ministry of Economy and Finance of Uzbekistan.

For comparison, external borrowing amounted to $5.5 billion in 2025.

Out of the earmarked $5 billion, $2.5 billion is designat...

title: Uzbekistan improves its Jizzakh transport network with new road facilities
description: TASHKENT, Uzbekistan, December 2. In Uzbekistan’s Jizzakh region, a new 700-meter overpass and a 4-kilometer highway have been built for nearly 290 billion soums ($24.38 million) to connect the regional center with the international M-39 highway, Trend reports via the press service of the President ...

title: Indian businesses invited to explore vast opportunity in Uzbekistan: Ambassador
description:
Indian businesses invited to explore vast opportunity in Uzbekistan: Ambassador

New Delhi, Dec 2 (UNI) Sardor Rustambaev, Ambassador of Uzbekistan to India on Tuesday highlighted the growing trade and investment opportunities for the Indian industry in Uzbekistan.

title: IATA Report Highlights Aviation’s Expanding Economic Impact in Uzbekistan
description: Uzbekistan’s rapidly growing aviation sector is delivering significant economic and employment benefits, according to the newly released Value of Air Transport Study from the International Air Transport Association (IATA). The report underscores the country’s sustained investment in airport infrastr...

title: Uzbekistan's Economy Takes Flight with Aviation Boost
description:
IATA

Tashkent – The International Air Transport Association (IATA) released the Value of Air Transport Study for Uzbekistan, highlighting that the country's continued focus on aviation has resulted in growing benefits in terms of jobs and economic activity.

title: EBRD Highlights Robust GDP Growth And Calls For More In-Depth Reforms In Uzbekistan
description: MENAFN - Trend News Agency)Uzbekistan's economy is expanding at a rapid pace, though continued fiscal discipline and deeper structural reforms remain vital for maintaining stability, Andi Aranitasi, Director and Head of Uzbekistan at the European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD), wrote...
